entry.title: Toolbox
entry.summary:
Here i will share the tools i use on a day to day basis and make my life easier.
I will try and limit this to stuff i think is really worth taklking about. Everything else check out My Github Stars
Windows
Mobaxterm
This is great for managing logo sessions to boxes when you are on a job. This has a nice SSH Tunnel tool. Also can spin up a number of services quickly web, ftp, smb…est

entry.title: Bash Tricks
entry.summary:
So here is a collections of bits I have in my .zshrc (yes im a zsh guy)
To install or use most of these can be added into .bashrc or .zshrc file providing you have the tool setup correctly.
I will keep adding cool bits to this list overtime.
enjoy :)
grep
some day to day greps that always useful to keep at the ready.
# colored grep alias grep='grep --color=auto' alias egrep='egrep --color...
